description:
About the job
If you are a Enterprise Cloud Architect with experience, please read on!

We are industry leaders helping the deaf community and making a difference in people's lives. A stable company with a startup-like culture. We are seeking a cloud architect responsible for developing strategy, architecture patterns, services and templates to support multiple cloud with emphasis on maximizing portability and reuse across cloud providers.

What You Will Be Doing
Develop cloud center of excellence governance process and team maturity
Makes high level design choices focused on manageability, reliability, scalability, usability & security
Lead proof-of-concepts to assess and build new capabilities within the infrastructure domain
Design and implement cloud disaster recovery strategy and high availability solutions in cloud
Recognize and develop opportunities to optimize the cloud spend
Strong leadership and team-building skills, and must be able to collaborate effectively with a group of high performing individuals & leaders
Guide, mentor and help to build the skill and experience to grow the talent
What You Need for this Position
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering field
9+ years of experience spanning technical architecture, infrastructure management, application development, middleware, database management or operations
4+ years of architect experience designing and managing Cloud-native or Cloud-enabled technical architecture in AWS/Azure cloud computing architecture
3+ years of hands-on experience designing and implementing solutions with Terraform, Ansible or equivalent IaC automation tools and technologies
Strong knowledge of network architectures, protocols, network security, and backup and replication technologies for disaster recovery in cloud infrastructure
Understand microservices, serverless and container technologies
Excellent knowledge of cloud computing technologies and current computing trends.
Strong problem-solving skills and experience troubleshooting cloud infrastructure issue
Cultivate a Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery mindset
Proficient in Linux and Windows environments
Working knowledge of GitHub and/or GitLab
AWS Certified Solution Architect is a must
Plus But Not Required
Experience with previous Cloud Migrations
Familiarity of Azure DevOps including Azure Pipelines, Azure Boards, and Azure Repos
What's In It for You
Salary: $135k-$170k+ depending on expeirence, etc. with up to 20% bonus
Constant pursuit of cutting-edge innovation and industry leading experience bring the most unique and reliable products and services
Stable company with startup culture: tons of growth opportunity!
Remote (or hybrid available if in Utah)
Medical, Dental, & Vision
Several insurance options
401k Plans: Retirement plans with company match so you can save for your future.
Wellness: Programs that encourage work-life balance in all aspects of physical, mental and financial wellbeing.
Competitive salary and bonus
Benefits
Vacation/PTO
Medical
Dental
Vision
401k
Bonus
So, if you are a Enterprise Cloud Architect with experience, please apply today!

Colorado employees will receive paid sick leave. For additional information about available benefits, please contact Jen Fick

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Jen.Fick@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JF12-1739306L103 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Jen Fick - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work â€“ In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
title: cloud architect intern
